text: I wish to consume analytics and send recommendations on basis of that. For the above-mentioned topic. I wish to get the document, reference link, or steps. How that can be done via API. Use case : I have a listing website. I wish to send recommendations to users consuming the analytics tracked by HubSpot analytics. Where the data the exchange will take place? From where the emails send ? How HubSpot will know that we have new listing published on my website. How can I send dynamic data via email? Dynamic data is the recommend listing on the basis of analytics. Any lead or reference please share
Hello everyone, i would love to know if is possible to import a landing page from another of my own HubSpot accounts.

Try customizing the form embed code using the ‘target’ param - it takes a selector for the element to build the form in. <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options|https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
